channel.title: Comments on: Quilt Inspired by Microsoft Windows 8

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/blog/index.php/archives/1866/comment-page-1#comment-22365">Kay Stephenson</a>.
Thanks for the kind words.
I've suggested she start her own blog several times. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kay Stephenson.

Thanks for the kind words.

I’ve suggested she start her own blog several times. :)

item.title: By: Kay Stephenson
item.dc:creator: Kay Stephenson
item.description: Love this modern quilted wall hanging, and the pattern is well done. Now get your wife her own blog! I'm a quilter and only saw this because my techie husband forwarded the link to me :-)
item.content:encoded: Love this modern quilted wall hanging, and the pattern is well done. Now get your wife her own blog! I’m a quilter and only saw this because my techie husband forwarded the link to me :-)
